document_data.name: Searing Light
document_data.mainbody: '''Searing light''' was a [[divine]] [[evocation]] [[spell]] that created a holy light that burned a [[cleric]]'s foes, especially [[undead]].
document_data.Effects: The cleric fired a beam of divine power, focused like a ray of [[the sun]], from their open palm, to a distance of {{SI|150|ft|long=yes}} or more for more experienced casters. Those it struck were harmed according to the power of the caster. Undead creatures were injured more, especially those vulnerable to bright light, while [[construct]]s and objects were damaged less.
